subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Coach Isiah Thomas reshuffled bodies in a vain search for identity in a team that has none. But there were still no clear answers after the Knicks lost 110-96 to the Orlando Magic.
snippet: Coach Isiah Thomas reshuffled bodies in a vain search for identity in a team that has none. But there were still no clear answers after the Knicks lost 110-96 to the Orlando Magic.
